title: From Sicily::2251 - String class::1003::Cycling the words
description:
# Description

Given a line contains N words, print the N lines. The first line is the same as the input. After printing each line, the first word of this line in put to the end of the next line.

# Input

A line contains N words seperated by one blank. N is not given in the problem: you need to count the number of words in the input line to find it out. The line contains less than 100 characters.

# Output

N lines.
The first line equals the input.
For the rest N-1 lines, the first word in a line in put to the end in the next line. There is one space between words.

# Sample_Input ``` Please think about it carefully ``` # Sample_Ouput ``` Please think about it carefully think about it carefully Please about it carefully Please think it carefully Please think about carefully Please think about it ``` # Hint

standard_input.standard_input0: love me or kill me please

standard_output.standard_output0:
love me or kill me please
me or kill me please love
or kill me please love me
kill me please love me or
me please love me or kill
please love me or kill me
